newsitem.title: USA: Acclaim sees greater Q4, year net loss.
newsitem.headline: Acclaim sees greater Q4, year net loss.

text.p: Acclaim Entertainment Inc, publisher of interactive entertainment software, said on Fiday it expects a net loss for the fiscal fourth quarter and full year greater than previously anticipated. It gave no figures.
It said there would be a delay in delivery of several new games, resulting in lower-than-expected revenue in its fourth quarter, ending August 31.
The company said products originally scheduled to benefit the fourth quarter now will benefit the first quarter of fiscal 1997. The postponement is not expected to hurt Christmas sales, it said.
